jobDescription: Vaco has a contract opportunity with a client in South Houston for a Business Analyst - Data Privacy project. The business analyst will work with the privacy program project team and be responsible for identifying business processes and systems that store, process or transfer personal data as defined by the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). You will work with the business units to create process and data flow documentation. Work in coordination with IT teams and use data discovery tools to locate personal data, determine its relevance, and identify any associated business processes. Help determine business process future state in order to support long term operational success and regulatory compliance.Responsibilities and Associated Duties:Engage with business teams to understand processes that involve personal dataElicit information using interviews, document analysis, requirements workshops, surveys, business process descriptions, use cases, scenarios, task analysis and workflow analysisAct as a liaison between business units, management, IT and the project teamConduct process mapping, data discovery and data flow analysisIdentify any process specific data retention or processing requirementsDocument data entry points, storage, inter-system exchanges and external transfersDesign and develop dashboards and metrics to improve understanding of business processesAdvise on ways of reducing data foot print and improving data management capabilityRequirementsBachelor's degree in MIS, Computer Systems, Business Management, or related area or equivalent combination of education and work experience5+ years of business process analysisExperience working in Enterprise Data Management, Data Analysis or Compliance preferredA proven track-record of business process mapping and data modellingFamiliarity with European Union data privacy requirements, the former U.S. Safe Harbor program or similar regulations preferredGood understanding of how software, data and business processes work togetherStrong experience in working well with cross-function teams in a global organizationAbility to understand IT and business architectural diagrams and modelsExcellent communication and documentation skills
